The CRA scam has escalated. In this case, 2 men impersonated police, handcuffed the victim, put her in the back of a car, and then convinced her to take out $6,000.
"Taking physical control of someone like this can be considered kidnapping,” says VPD Constable Jason Doucette https://t.co/SuyNzpPEhi
